attributes.name: hx-chart
attributes.description: The **hx-chart** attribute is used to create a chart.

attributes.name: hx-chart-type
attributes.description: The **hx-chart-type** attribute sets the type of chart to be displayed.

attributes.name: hx-chart-labels
attributes.description: The **hx-chart-type** attribute contains an JSON array of labels to be displayed on the chart.

attributes.name: hx-chart-datasets
attributes.description: The **hx-chart-datasets** attribute contains an JSON array of datasets which contain the data to be displayed on the chart.
